narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: is a Medicaid provider based in Unknown location. From 2018-01 through 2018-08, this provider received $186K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 5 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 24.2× the national median for A4253 (A4253), at $168 per claim vs. the median of $7. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
83% of billing is concentrated in A4253 (A4253), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2018-08, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
